title: Synamedia
description: C++ firmware development for digital video receivers/decoders
Working to support video transmission over a variety of satellite, IP, and cloud-based networking protocols

title: Microchip
description: Reduced the runtime of power estimation in the Libero SoC Design Suite by 5 times
Fixed software issues to improve accuracy of the FPGA power estimation tool
Applied knowledge in performance optimization, graph theory, and modeling of digital hardware

title: ecobee
description: Managed QA test planning and execution for release of new SmartSensor for doors and windows
Worked on reliable and secure data transmission and pairing of SmartSensor devices using a proprietary radio protocol
Performed exploratory, integration and regression testing for ecobee products

title: Klashwerks
description: Improved energy efficiency of Raven firmware, an OBD-II smart dashcam device
Introduced support for a new CAN-based communication protocol in embedded software running on an STM32 microcontroller
Provided the development team with a multi-threaded OBD-II simulator developed using Python

title: University of Waterloo
description: Initiated the development of a proposed safety system for the student machine shop
Designed a network of RFID devices using Arduino micro-controllers with C++ for the software
Assisted engineering students and faculty at the IT consulting office

title: DataKinetics
description: Built an online interactive voice response system using PHP and MySQL for customer support
Used Twilio and SendGrid tools and deployed the application using Heroku
